relationships.entity_2: hogwarts school of witchcraft and wizardry
relationships.description: Harry is a student at Hogwarts, as indicated by the list of requirements provided to him by Hagrid.

relationships.entity_2: hogwarts school of witchcraft and wizardry
relationships.description: Hagrid works at Hogwarts, as he is providing guidance to Harry on what he needs for the upcoming year.
Miranda Goshawk wrote one of the required textbooks, The Standard Book of Spells (Grade 1).
Bathilda Bagshot wrote one of the required textbooks, A History of Magic.
Adalbert Waffling wrote one of the required textbooks, Magical Theory.
Emeric Switch wrote one of the required textbooks, A Beginner’s Guide to Transfiguration.

relationships.entity_2: one thousand magical herbs and fungi
relationships.description: Phyllida Spore wrote one of the required textbooks, One Thousand Magical Herbs and Fungi.
Arsenius Jigger wrote one of the required textbooks, Magical Drafts and Potions.
